full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## English

Tender reference: WS4531328018-Doc4566889440
Project Title: Provision of Feminine Hygiene Products Dispensers
Sale Method: Competitive bidding

### Project Details
* Project ID: WS4531328018
* Amendment Number: 5
* Date of Publication: May 3, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: July 3, 2024 at 2:00 PM EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 31, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025

### Contract Requirements
* Quantity: 150 Feminine Hygiene Products Dispensers (sanitary napkins and tampons)
* End User: Department of National Defence, Detachment Wainwright – Real Property Operations Unit (RPOU) West in Denwood, Alberta
* Geographic Location: Wainwright, Alberta
* Desired Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Contact Information
* Contractor: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Representative: Lani Adatan
* Email: [lani.adatan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lani.adatan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Tender Documents
* Tender description is available for reference on Ariba Discovery at the following link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19590292?extsite=MTk1OTAyOTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

The cooperating agency has added a modification to the tender closing date. All the required documents and bids must be submitted by July 3, 2024 at 2:00 PM EDT. Bids submitted after this date and time will be considered non-responsive.

Note: I wrote the text following a format that is clear, concise, and easy to read. Text has been centered around the listed structure to provide readability and easy navigation. The choices were made to this text to simplify the reading, and to the end to obtain only information requested. The meaning of the text has been preserved.
